Detailed Description

A Simple Dynamic Controller. The SimpleDynamicController implements an adaptive signal controlling that for a fixed phases sequence and cycle duration will set the phases's lenghts propotional to their vehicles throughputs in some past cycle.

Add either the parameters or gradient or traces into a vector

Parameters:
v vector to store stuff into. v must be at least as big as total params/grads/traces. Will not be resized. Will not be cleared.
